description: This file contains automated tests for the React component 'App' in a notes application, utilizing the @testing-library/react framework. It mocks API calls related to notes and verifies UI behavior for rendering, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the mock API return values and clears call histories before each test.

methods.name: test "renders Notes header"
methods.description: Verifies that the Notes header is rendered properly upon loading the App.

methods.name: test "creates a note via API layer"
methods.description: Simulates user input to create a new note and verifies that the API and UI update accordingly.

methods.name: test "updates a note via API layer"
methods.description: Simulates editing an existing note and verifies the update via API and UI reflect changes.

methods.name: test "deletes a note via API layer"
methods.description: Simulates deleting a note and verifies removal from the UI and API call.
